updates.title: Cursor AI coding assistant raises $2.3B just 5 months after its previous round, signaling massive investor confidence in AI-powered development tools as the startup continues developing its Composer AI model.

Google launches major NotebookLM updates including 'Deep Research' tool for automated complex online research and support for additional file types, expanding AI-powered research capabilities for creators.
ChatGPT introduces pilot group chat feature across Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan, marking OpenAI's first step toward creating shared AI experiences while maintaining private user data.

Google unveils SIMA 2 agent powered by Gemini that can reason and act in virtual environments, representing a significant step toward general-purpose AI agents and AGI systems with self-improving capabilities.

Apple updates App Store guidelines to restrict apps from sharing personal data with third-party AI systems without explicit user disclosure and permission, tightening privacy controls around AI integrations.
